snippet: The authorities discovered and destroyed more than 1,600 coca plants this week near the Guatemala border, the first such find in Mexico in recent memory.
lead_paragraph: The authorities discovered and destroyed more than 1,600 coca plants this week near the Guatemala border, the first such find in Mexico in recent memory.

headline.main: Mexico: Discovery of Coca Plants Puzzles Authorities
headline.print_headline: Mexico: Discovery of Coca Plants Puzzles Authorities
